entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Ottawa (Kanata - Orléans)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:12 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mostly Cloudy, -9.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Ottawa Macdonald-Cartier Int'l Airport 1:00 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
Condition: Mostly Cloudy
Temperature: -9.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -17.1°C
Wind: WNW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 12. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 near midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow with risk of freezing drizzle. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the afternoon. Wind becoming east 20 late in the afternoon. High minus 9. Wind chill minus 22 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
